facts.text: Trajan becomes Roman Emperor after the death of Nerva.
Rashidun Caliphate, then the largest empire in history, ends with death of Ali. Succeeded by the Umayyad Caliphate
St Vitalian ends his reign as Catholic Pope
Sergius II ends his reign as Catholic Pope
Wrongful execution of noted Song Dynasty General Yue Fei.
Dante becomes a Florentine political exile
Pope Clement VI issues the Bull Unigenitus.
States of Gelderland accepts Willem van Kleef as viceroy
Willem of Orange becomes a Knight of the Order of the Golden Fleece
Vatican opens 7 year trial against scholar Giordano Bruno
1st American lime kiln begins operation (Providence RI)
Pirate Henry Morgan lands at Panama City
Mustafa II becomes the Ottoman sultan in Istanbul on the death of Ahmed II. Mustafa rules until his death in 1703.
Tsar Peter the Great sets first Russian state budget
1st US state university chartered, Athens, Georgia
President Monroe appoints first US ambassadors to South America
